lyrics:
Michael:
Rattled alone in a crowd 
of many
Never collected from
the lost and found
I was drawn by the sparkles
in your eyes
Kort mellansp.  (0,03”)
I always knew there was
someone like me
Finding you was
Like to turn a key
Stars are only
visible in the dark. 
Ref: Caisa
We´re still kids
Wishing on the 
same stars
We´re still kids
We keep dancing in 
our hearts.
Mellanspel: saxofon  (0,16”)
Michael:
Stardust flew when
the mold was broken
We´re all pieces from
the same old soul 
We are connected
No matter where we are.
Ref: Caisa
We´re still kids
Wishing on the 
same stars
We´re still kids
We keep dancing in 
our hearts.
We´re still kids
Wishing on the 
same stars
We´re still kids
We keep dancing in 
our hearts.
Timeless souls
With a common ground
Never be afraid to play
Timeless souls
With a common ground
Common ground.
Mellanspel: saxofon  (0,16”)
We´re still kids
We keep dancing in 
our hearts.
We´re still kids
Wishing on the 
same stars
We´re still kids
We keep dancing in 
our hearts.
song_name: Michael Feiner & Caisa: We're Still Kids (2013)
